title: Exciting Nighty Night Announcement!
itunes:title: Exciting Nighty Night Announcement!
description:
Good evening and welcome to Nighty Night with Rabia Chaudry: Bedtime Stories to Keep You Awake. Starting next Tuesday, May 17, Nighty Night is experiencing an exciting temporary pivot! The show will feature Rabia sitting down and talking with her favorite true crime friend experts about the real life cases that inspired some of your most loved Nighty Night tales.  Then, starting in the Fall we will re-continue our regular format featuring horrifying bedtime stories that will chill you to the bone!  Nighty Night Dear listeners! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: KAST MEDIA | Rabia Chaudry
